original_title: Quadruplets born at Peradeniya Teaching Hospital
original_body_lines: A resident of Thorayaya in Kurunegala has given birth to quadruplets (three males and one female) at Peradeniya Teaching Hospital today.
The babies were weighing 1.3 kg and 1.1 kg at birth, and they were sent to the special infant treatment unit.
According to hospital sources, the obstetrician and gynecologist at the Peradeniya Teaching Hospital are providing medical treatment to these quadruplets.
In the meantime, the father of these infants, Buddika Herath, said that he was extremely happy about this and that he will look after them with great dedication and love. (K.L Suraweera-Kandy)
